net.viktorc.detroid.framework.gui.dialogs

Class OptionsAlert

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.scene.control.Dialog<javafx.scene.control.ButtonType>
      • javafx.scene.control.Alert
        • net.viktorc.detroid.framework.gui.dialogs.OptionsAlert
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.event.EventTarget

    public class OptionsAlert
extends javafx.scene.control.Alert
    An alert for displaying the UCI options the search engine provides to the user in the form of GUI controls the user can interact with.
    Author:
    Viktor

        public OptionsAlert(javafx.stage.Stage owner,
                    UCIEngine engine)
        Constructs an instance based on the UCI option offered by the chess engine.
        Parameters:
        owner - The parent stage.
        engine - The engine whose UCI options are to be displayed as interactive GUI controls.
